roleset.name: perform a vocal accompaniment

example.name: passive, all args
example.text: Cardboard noisemakers , substitutes for the unavailable tin models , were being hawked and bought at makeshift stands every few yards along Broadway , and [one 's ears]-2 were continually serenaded [*-2] by the horns ' rasps and bleats .
example.arg: by the horns ' rasps and bleats

example.name: transitive
example.text: Outside , in the summertime fields behind the motel , a thousand crickets serenaded us .

roleset.note: Framed by Neville. No VerbNet entry.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'serenade' based on sentences in brown corpus.
